| Overview                = The '''Tordon-Naans''' were a group of [[Homo sapiens|humans]] that lived in the [[Savage Land]], in the city of [[Tordon-Na]] and worshiped the god [[Ilaka-Aron (Earth-616)|Ilaka-Aron]].{{r|Ka-Zar Vol 2 10}}{{Verify source}}
| History                 = <!-- 
===[[Modern Age]]=== -->
The Tordon-Naans beliefs were manipulated by [[Sylitha (Earth-616)|Sylitha]], who sought power. They practice [[Homo sapiens|human]] sacrifices to appease their god [[Ilaka-Aron (Earth-616)|Ilaka-Aron]]. They were stopped by [[Kevin Plunder (Earth-616)|Ka-Zar]].{{r|Ka-Zar Vol 2 10}}
